title: Week 17 Picks Against the Spread, Best Bets, Gambling Advice (Football 12/27)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco and R.J. White for Week 17 gambling advice, covering all 16 games on Sunday. The guys discuss 49ers-Seahawks (7:10), Eagles-Giants (12:17), Titans-Texas (16:25), Steelers-Ravens (19:40), Jets-Bills (26:15), Falcons-Bucs (29:50), Dolphins-Patriots (33:17), Raiders-Broncos (37:08), Redskins-Cowboys (47:00), Browns-Bengals (51:15), Bears-Vikings (52:20), Colts-Jaguars (53:40), Saints-Panthers (56:10), Packers-Lions (58:20), Chargers-Chiefs (59:30) and Cardinals-Rams (1:03:10)
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
